sentences.en: A discussion took place respecting the provision of science teaching.
sentences.cn: 关于自然科学课的开设展开了一场讨论。

sentences.en: Develop respecting life and happy growth of healthy children.
sentences.cn: 培养尊重生命,快乐成长的健全儿童.

sentences.en: He died as any self-respecting gangster should — in a hail of bullets.
sentences.cn: 他死于乱枪之下——匪徒典型的最终下场。

sentences.en: He said anyone giving orders without respecting the wishes of his people is heading for disaster.
sentences.cn: 他说任何不尊重人民意愿而发号施令的人都注定会走向灭亡。

sentences.en: I am at a loss respecting his whereabouts.
sentences.cn: 关于他的下落,我一无所知.

sentences.en: If respecting the law means being like him, that's terrible.
sentences.cn: 如果遵守法律的话,就意味着会像他那样那太糟糕了.

sentences.en: Miss Keeldar , in speaking to Moore, took a tone animated and dignified, confidential and self - respecting .
sentences.cn: 基达尔小姐在同穆尔先生谈话的时候, 声调既活泼又有尊严, 既亲密又不失 自尊.

sentences.en: No self - respecting doctor would refuse to treat a sick person.
sentences.cn: 凡是有 自尊心 的医生都不会对病人置之不顾的.

sentences.en: No self-respecting gourmet would travel in France without the Michelin red guide.
sentences.cn: 任何地道的美食家游览法国时都会带着一本红皮的《米其林指南》。

sentences.en: No self-respecting journalist would ever work for that newspaper.
sentences.cn: 凡有自尊心的记者都不会为那家报纸工作。

sentences.en: Poorly designed software will make assertions that no self - respecting individual would ever make.
sentences.cn: 设计糟糕的软件会做出凡是有自尊的人都不会做出的断言.

sentences.en: Respecting the fact that the accused was a minor, the charges were dropped.
sentences.cn: 鉴于被告尚未成年这一事实, 免于起诉.

sentences.en: The secret in education lies in respecting the student.
sentences.cn: 教育(成功)的秘诀在于尊重学生.

sentences.en: The targets in oil exploration are deeper than in mineral respecting.
sentences.cn: 石油勘探的目地层比矿物勘探的深.

sentences.en: We confirm our call of last week respecting our offers to you.
sentences.cn: 关于上周本公司通过电话给您的报价,我们特予以确认.

phrases.tran_cn: 使人敬仰；令人肃然起敬
在每一方面；从各个方面
在某一点上，在一点上；在一个方面
偏袒，袒护，偏心(尤指根据交情、势力、财富而待人有差别)

trans.tran_cn: 尊重( respect的现在分词 )，尊敬，关心，慎重对待
